amendment.description: To amend the title of the bill.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4081 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4081 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S11848; text: CR S11848) To amend the title of the bill.
